name: thomas dunnavant
text: I've been seeing Ms Emily for a couple months.  And, she has been helpful in providing me some new tools to deal with issues surrounding the death of my mother that knocked my train off the track.  While I cannot say that I am ready for the Cannon Ball Express, I am feeling so much better since i met her.  I have been treated with dignity and grace and recommend her without question.

name: Nisey
text: Ali is absolutely wonderful! He was very informative and professional during my massage it was very much needed. I definitely will be returning. The atmosphere is great 👍

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Robett Robinson
text: Great place to get relaxing therapy

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: KENNEDY SPIVEY
text:
Love this place staff very friendly and professional!!!!! Best massage in Montgomery check it out !!!!!
Kerry p

resp.text: Thank you very much Kennedy Spivey! We are happy to hear about positive experience! We appreciate your business.

name: Beverly Garrett
text: Love Mind and Body Spa.  Great atmosphere.  I have referred several of my family, friends, and colleagues to them.  Personable and gives a great massage.  Ali has fixed my bricked up muscles several times.  211❤❤

resp.text: Awesome review Dr. Garrett. It's our purpose to help you feel your best and we can't wait for your next session. And as always we appreciate your business.

name: M N
text: Foad has been working with me for 2 years now after 2 shoulder surgeries. He deserves 10/10 stars and has been a godsend! Love his encouragement and focus.  Have recommended Mind and Body service to my  friends!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you very  much for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: David Alexander
text: Great service,  their therapy keeps me working. I recommend highly.

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Jeff Welch
text: Foad provides the best deep tissue and myofacial therapy in Montgomery. I recommend to anyone with back issues or sports injuries.

name: John Smith
text:
Foad at a time when my circulation was in bad shape rescued me with a deep Tissue orthopedic medical massage and workout weekly. My Doctor recommended him and was decision I ever made.
Circulation is good and no more aches!

resp.text: I was pleased to welcome you to our practice. I look forward to seeing you again. And I appreciate your physician's confidence and trust.

name: Jorge Serafin
text: My experience here has been extraordinary! I have had many different types of massages throughout the world, but my experience here has been the best overall. Foad has been outstanding in his treatment and recommendations.

resp.text: Thank you Jorge! We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us.

name: Revewer Smith
text: The massage therapist at this studio is VERY nice and personable, but his technique is not therapeuatic at all.  I left the massage session feeling worse.  His technique is just to massage and massage without regard to whether he is relieving tightness or not.  Unlike some of the other studios that have a technique, he doesn't really seem to have  a technique.

name: Jack Durham
text: Always a relaxing experience to visit Foad at Mind & Body. wish I could go more often. Very knowledgeable about a variety of health and healing regimens. Also a fun guy to chat with. Always leave with a smile.

name: Larry Chapman
text: Foad has been a faithful friend for 20 years. He is a good man and excellent at what he does. Countless times he has taken care of me and my family. Thank you Foad for running a first class business!!!

resp.text:
Good afternoon Larry
I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your business for past 20 years.
You have paid me the nicest compliment possible. I appreciate your confidence and trust.

name: Mark McLendon
text: Great people and top notch service.   I started coming in tons of pain and not only did the massage help but the stretches and exercise homework got me back on the road to health.  Can not say enough good things about Foad and his team!

name: Aaron Esfahani
text:
Foad and the whole staff at Mind and Body are first class. Likewise, the massages that I have had here are far better than what I've experienced home in Atlanta. Additionally, they specialize in sports and therapeutic treatments that will have you coming back for more. As an honest reviewer, I would have to say that you must try this place!

AAE

name: Keith Blackwell
text: Experienced my first massage at Mind  and Body today.  I could not  have  been more pleased with the experience - it was the best massage I have ever received.

name: Carrie Yates
text:
I began going to see Foad at Mind & Body a little over a month ago, and already, I can see a marked improvement in my symptoms. For example, I was unable to turn my neck all the way to the right for about a month when I first saw him.  Foad repaired that in two sessions.

In addition, he makes it an extremely comfortable and easy assessment process. I never got the sense that I was next in line, or that I needed to be in a hurry. The atmosphere is quiet, relaxing, and tranquil. He makes all of his oils home made, and they are incredible. He gives feedback, suggestions, and has a wholistic approach--all without making you feel like you've done something wrong, or haven't done something you were supposed to to take better care of yourself.

Very reasonable priced, very effective, and very easy to do in the middle of a day.

resp.text: I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your recent visits to my Wynlakes location. It was a sincere pleasure to be of service. I look forward to seeing you again.

name: Anne Mazyck
text: Great experience. It definitely helped the headache. Ali is very gentle and very good.

name: Customer Critique
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!! I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. The therapist was late and I felt he rush through the massage trying to get himself back on schedule with no regard to me or my needs.  There was nothing relaxing or soothing about the massage.  I felt  exhausted and pretty beat up afterwards.  There was no balance or method to his technique.  Not worth the time or money.  DEFINITELY WILL NOT GO BACK!

name: L Skipper
text: Foad is an excellent therapist.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Zsuzsa Rozgonyi
text: Foad gives a 5 star massage. I highly recommend Mind & Body. Great atmosphere, great treatments! Love, love, love this spa!

resp.text: Thank you 🙏

name: lens lens
text: Foad is an excellent massage therapist. He can pin point and treat areas that create problems for other areas. He is highly recommended.

name: Arpi Sekeryan
text: I have been getting massages regularly for years, and since I moved from Canada, I needed to find a massage therapist and fast...  Luckily, I found Mind & Body because Foad"s Thai massages,  are by far the best!!

name: Mary Allinder
text: I would recommend Foad and Ali to anyone searching for agreat place to destress and unwind . These two men have great skill in massage therapy and many more ways to get the best out of life! I highly recommend Mind and Body Holistic Spa!

name: Missy Mathis
text: Best Massage in town! I highly recommend!

name: Ryan Powers
text: Unbelievable! Not only did Foad relieve my lower back pain but he gave me specific stretches to help prevent lower back pain!

name: Susie White
text: Foad has been my go-to massage therapist for at least 5 years now.  I wouldn't trade him for anything!

name: Nia Taylor
text: I had a great first visit. I came in with back and neck pain and William, the owner, used his magic fingers to help me. He is clearly knowledgeable and passionate about what he does and gave me some great suggestions on how to help myself at home. Very nice guy and will definitely continue to come here.

resp.text:
Thanks Nia! I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit.
- William Henson

name: Leslie Dejohn
text: William and his team are all excellent in what they do. I recently had a stretch session with William and he helped release areas in my hips and shoulders that were giving me a great deal of discomfort. He was careful to make sure that I was feeling the stretch in that specific area. He communicated with me each stretch and what I was supposed to be feeling. I would highly recommend a stretch session for anyone that is experiencing tightness in any area of their body. Can’t say enough about this group and their knowledge and professionalism. I have been seeing them regularly for at least 3 years.

resp.text:
I'm glad you enjoyed your assisted stretching session Leslie. And thank you so much for the review!

- William

name: Kelly Lansden
text: I got a massage from Abbey Porte a few days ago for a chronic pain flare up and she did an amazing job! Last week I could barely function because I was in so much pain, but now I feel great! My pain dropped from a 7/10 to a 2/10. That’s major improvement! I highly recommend Abbey for pain management massage. She knows what she’s doing!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for the review Kelly! We're so glad you enjoyed your massage with Abbey the other day! It's so good to hear that your pain levels have dropped so dramatically.

- William Henson (owner)

name: soapy jones
text: A wonderful experience with a wonderful group of people. I highly recommend and am looking forward to my next appointment!

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit!  And thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Mary R
text: I’m so happy I found this place! I’ve struggled with back and neck pain since I was a teenager, among other things here and there, and now that I work in dentistry it’s been even harder on my back. I wanted to find a place that not only gave a relaxing massage, but could recognize and target my problem areas. William listened and explained what he would be doing and even gave me some at-home tips to get things loosened up. I’ve already booked my next appointment and can’t wait to see more results!

name: Tiffany Postell
text: Rob Ginwright did a great job focusing on my problem areas. He explained everything throughout the session and made sure I was informed about everything. He even gave me tips on things I can do at home, and I have continued to see improvement. Definitely looking forward to my next session.

name: Debbie Momma Dee Dee
text: I went to APM with chronic pain in one shoulder. Abbey carefully and persistently worked on every muscle knot until I had complete relief! Her knowledge of the body muscles was extremely impressive and she knew exactly where the problem was likely occurring and how to solve it. I will be a regular from this day forward!

name: Allison Daniel
text: Rob Ginwright has helped me so much. He was very proessional and carefully explained everything he was doing. I feel better than I have in years. I can't wait to go back.

name: Jill Nelson
text: Clean and very quiet. The therapist was very nice and willing to help my pain area. She was very social with me which was very nice and just over all a great therapist. Everyone there was very friendly and nice. I would definitely recommend this place for all your needs or just for a day of relaxing!

name: Chyna B.
text: Clean and relaxing space. I had a male therapist for a deep tissue, he was great, I left feeling relived, I will be back!

name: Amy Spinks
text: I received a 90 minute massage treatment with Alex and she was WONDERFUL!!  She was very professional and very helpful in relieving my pain all while providing a relaxing, "pampered" massage!  I suffer with Osteoarthritis and had been told this treatment would help with day to day muscle tension.  It was true and I will be returning for more massages with Alex!!

name: Frances Tombrello
text: The Physical Therapist was very kind and very interested to help me.  This was my first visit and have another appointment on August 30th. I felt very comfortable ,.  Would recommend Mr. Henson to my friends and family. (One of my family members goes every 2 weeks and has been doing this for several years.

name: Mona Squeels
text: I just had my first massage by Alex and it was absolutely wonderful. She was informed, and made sure I understood everything. It was wonderful to be able to explain what was wrong and her explain what she was going to do to help! I cannot wait to go back.

name: Cindy Carruba
text: So wonderful! Went in for a extreme pain in shoulder and next day it was gone! Definitely recommend this place for any kind of massage you need.

name: Drew Moore
text: I was having severe sciatic nerve pain. I had a 90 minute session with Alex that helped tremendously. Very knowledgeable and professional. Wonderful place conveniently located.

name: David Burrowes
text: Great! They have helped me tremendously! I thought I needed back surgery, but Alex got me feeling better and able to do more than I have in a few years. Highly recommend!

name: Shella Sylla
text: William is an extremely skilled masseuse. He took the time to assess my unique situation, and worked to alleviate muscle pain, soreness and even some structural issues that I had mentioned to him.  I love working with people who are obviously passionate about what they do, and William exemplifies this through his skill and mastery of his craft.  I highly recommend that anyone who is looking for more than your typical "feel good" massage and who wants to get real therapeutic results should go and see him.  Totally worth the investment!!

name: Cindy L Bili
text: William worked on trigger points in my neck and shoulder.  I have not had pain since my first visit, which was 3 days ago and I have had chronic pain for years.  I am so excited to have found a massage therpist that I truly feel can help me with eliminating back pain!

name: Bob Berry
text: Jennifer's 30 minute deep tissue was just what I needed. I had several knots that she worked out and the massage results lasted a long time. I am sold on these folks and they are very convenient to I65 at Hwy 31 (in Hoover) and are very professional and accommodating. Great massage!

name: Julie Jefferson
text: I had a wonderful massage with Alex. She was very professional and thorough.  My back pain was greatly relieved.  I would definitely recommend her to others, and will be returning myself.

name: Morton Ulakovits
text: I've been here 3 or 4 times now.  They do a great job at catering to your specific issues.  For me, a massage every month is just what I needed. Friendly, professional, convenient and affordable would be how I describe them.

resp.text: We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the services we provide. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Lauren Hughes
text: I've struggled with persistent muscle tension in my upper back, neck, and lower back for quite awhile. Physical therapy and dry needling have helped tremendously, but the muscle tension was still present all day every day. The tension makes it difficult to maintain proper posture and contributes to lordosis in my lower back. After one treatment from William last week, I can see a big improvement. Tension in my chest is greatly reduced, which makes maintaining proper posture much easier. Any headaches I've had since then are mild, and I've had less upper and lower back pain. I still have a long way to go, but I'm excited about the progress made in just one session!

name: Megan Therrien
text: I highly recommend Alternative Pain Management! About 6 months ago, I finally decided to go to a massage therapist on a regular basis to try and deal with recurring upper back problems, headaches, and TMJ issues. I have had massages all over the place (massage envy, spas, other therapists), and I don't think I have ever met a massage therapist as attentive and creative as William. Even though he is working on the same places, every appointment is a new experience and he ALWAYS manages to find little places I had no idea were even hurting! William is easy to talk to and work with, and I appreciate that he offers advice and tips to help manage my problems in between visits. I can't say enough good things about William and Alternative Pain Management!

name: Matt Butler
text: Went to see William at APM at the suggestion of my orthopedist because of a nagging muscle knot in my back. This was my first visit and William was pleasant and thorough with his explanations of what he was going to do and what I should expect. I have noticed some improvement with my back but he mentioned it could take a couple of sessions to help release everything. I go back in a week to continue the work on my issue and will look forward to continued relief.

name: Kathryn Groat
text: My husband and I have been going at least once a month for over 2 years now for therapeutic massages. Jennifer and William are both very knowledgeable and professional!

name: Brandy Wills
text: Jennifer and William are a great team! Jennifer has helped immensely with my pain management! I highly recommend!!!

name: Greg Mullinax
text: William at APM is very skilled in deep tissue massage. I've had 4 visits now and every time my condition has improved dramatically. He is treating me for multiple injuries and aches. I am very happy with the results. I highly recommend William.

name: Heather Batey
text: William is a knowledgeable and extremely skilled massage therapist. He uses a variety of techniques with different patients to achieve the best possible outcome. He is trained in myofascial release and neuromuscular therapy as well as the more popular Swedish and deep tissue techniques. The atmosphere is relaxed and inviting, and I always leave feeling so much better. Highly recommend!

name: Shane Nicholas
text: I've been going to Alternative Pain Management for about 6 months now and the results are incredible. I have had a dull pain at the base of my skull for a decade and within a few treatments it was completely gone. No more dull pain. No more headaches. William is amazing and didn't stop at treating the symptoms but worked until he found the source. As someone that dealt with recurring pain for years and thought there was no hope, I can't recommend Alternative Pain Management highly enough. Best in Bham!

name: Monika Croom
text: At first I wasn't sure what to expect as I have always gone to a spa type massage deal, but because this is for an injury/pain, this alternative management was the next step for me outside doctors and chiropractors.  Although walking in I was reluctant because the set up was not what I had expected, I found it to be very clean and comfortable.  William Henson is very professional and knowledgeable in this field.  He was very soft in his approach, but his hands were really strong to really get into my pain issues.  I have only had 1 treatment but I have made an appointment for another as I experienced a good bit of improvement off one treatment.  At the end of the session, he also took the time to show me exercises specific to my ailment.

resp.text:
Thanks Monika, I'm always  happy to help in any way that I can.
-William

name: DannaMichellRay
text: I have lower back pain and trying to avoid another epidural. My pain reoccurred from a yoga class that was a little advanced for me which left me in pain - again.  A friend recommend Jennifer @ APM so I gave it a try.  Jennifer was well informed with my injury and knew exactly what I needed.  To be honest, deep tissue massage is not a relaxing and soothing kind of therapy but it's specific to help relieve my very tight muscles and connective tissue. I instantly felt some relief and looking forward to my second session.

name: Izz Noland
text: Great service, a hidden gem in Hoover. Alex did a wonderful job explaining everything and working on my extremely tense back!

name: Jessica Peterson
text: I had significant neck and  shoulder pain from answering the phone and holding the phone up to my ear with my shoulder. William used myofascial techniques on me and I have never felt better! It was the least painful and most effective experience ever! Thanks William!

name: Ritter Cindy
text: Very professional, relaxing atmosphere, great massage and pain relief. I highly recommend .

name: Siera Justice
text: William is a wonderful- he is very efficient in patient care, pain management & very thorough. I would highly recommend his services!

name: Daniel Moore
text: William has done a great job in targeting the pressure points in the nerves causing my pain from stenosis and sciatica.  As an artist, I spend hundreds of hours per month seated at the easel with my muscles locked basically into the same position.  My weekly visits help loosen and restore those muscles back to normal.  Plus, William works wonders at getting cricks out of my neck and shoulders.  It should go without saying that I highly recommend APM!

name: Ashley McNaughton
text: Jennifer is great at deep tissue work.  I am about to schedule my second massage with her.  The hunt for a great massage therapist for my pain is over. Thank you!

name: Beth Gray
text: I gave my husband a SpaFinder gift card for Christmas. We checked to see which places would take them and found Alternative Pain Management. Though the reception area was plain, his initial impression quickly changed once he met Jennifer. After a brief assessment, she was able to find the trouble spots in his back and neck and was able to work out the knots thoroughly. She even found new places that he had not previously realized were an issue. Her demeanor and professionalism were top notch and the atmosphere was very quiet and relaxing.  We are making another appt and would highly recommend Alternative Pain Management.

name: Chyna B.
text: Clean and relaxing space. I had a male therapist for a deep tissue, he was great, I left feeling relived, I will be back!

name: Siera Justice
text: William is a wonderful- he is very efficient in patient care, pain management & very thorough. I would highly recommend his services!

name: Milton Malone
text: Very professional staff. I am very happy with my results and will be using them in the future for massage therapy. :)

name: Yan Zhu
text: Excellent therapist, really works on your body and helps you with your injury. Professional and helpful. I highly recommend it.

name: Izz Noland
text: Great service, a hidden gem in Hoover. Alex did a wonderful job explaining everything and working on my extremely tense back!

name: Ritter Cindy
text: Very professional, relaxing atmosphere, great massage and pain relief. I highly recommend .

name: Carol
text: The massages I get from William is one of the things that make it possible for me to keep moving.

name: Anna Holmes
text: They have helped me deal with chronic pain. Alexis is wonderful.

name: Bart Styes
text: They helped me SO MUCH with recurring back pain!

name: Luciana Silva
text: Alex did a great job. I'll go to her again.

name: Carol
text: The massages I get from William is one of the things that make it possible for me to keep moving.

name: Bart Styes
text: They helped me SO MUCH with recurring back pain!

name: Jerry Little
text: Great experience.  Procedure was thoroughly explained.

name: Pam Thomas
text: Jennifer is great and has helped me tremendously!

name: Zachary Allison
text: Great experience

name: Kurtis Moore
text: Very professional environment. William communicated exactly what his plan was and he relieved my pain within 60 minutes. I definitely recommend William and the team at Alternative pain management.

name: Drea Burbank
text: Knowledgeable and friendly yogis. Great studio, I recommend the triple-threat!

name: Brian Morton
text: Best yoga facility in Birmingham by far. Very skilled staff with credentials a mile long. Excellent classes you will never forget. Teacher training available. Seminars taught by famous yogis from around the world. They have a true hot room with humidity control and CO2 sensors. Super clean as well. I love the Zebra mats that challenge my balance and protect my joints. They are also great for falling out of inversions..

name: Beverly Berry
text: There is no place like Kiva Hot Yoga! I love all of the instructors and the atmosphere of the studio is second to none. The vibe is welcoming and the workouts are energizing and addictive. Come on over to the wild side and join the Kiva family! I promise you won’t regret it!

name: Joy Gilbert
text: Love love love Kiva. I hadn't done hot yoga in about 3 years, due to moving to Alabama. I had missed it so much and was so thrilled to have found a studio in bham. They always make you feel so welcome, and go the extra mile to try to get to know you. Definitely recommend :) Trina is the best!!

name: Shannon Tyndall
text: I loved yoga classes that I attended in Mobile but when I moved back to Birmingham, I couldn't find my yoga "home" until I came to Kiva. The truly do a phenomenal job. The instructors are great at encouraging you and they really seem to care about your health and well being. They have a great mix of varying levels of classes. I enjoy feeling challenged but having more zin options. I would highly recommend trying no matter your level of experience.

name: Carneisha Cain
text: This is a great hot yoga studio in Alabama. I have only been a couple of times but everyone is very welcoming and management will work with you if you have any issues.

resp.text: It was great to have you practice with us again, Carneisha!

name: Raquel T Green
text:
First class was great! So happy for the invite Christa. Never thought I would be comfortable in a yoga class, but the  exuberant reception and calming mood made for a most memorable first time yoga experience. Thank you everyone at Kiva Hot yoga, from reception
to instructor, as well  as fellow patrons!!!
Namasté

resp.text: Come back when you can, Raquel!

name: Amanda Darby
text: This is such a fun way to get both exercise and care for myself mentally and spiritually. I've also lost 20+ lbs since starting about 4 months ago and coming consistently several times per week. I love the variety of the classes so I never get bored. And the staff is always so friendly and helpful. This is a perfect fitness regimen for anyone at all, inexperienced or a professional yogi!

name: Megan Elliott
text: Love everything about it!! Incredible workouts with teachers who take the time to demonstrate, correct and challenge you. Every skill level is welcome and there is no judgement. The showers with provided blow dryers, brushes, hair bands, shampoo, etc. are an added bonus. Love Kiva!

name: Tara Rosschile
text: Hot yoga was literally HOTT!! The instructor did her thing! As a first- timer, she didn't make me feel incredibly awkward or humiliated. I especially enjoyed the calming aspect of the whole experience!

name: Laura Nelson
text: This place is the real deal! Nothing is short changed here!! The instructors are all very helpful and knowledgeable. Even the members are very friendly !!! You really become family when you join Kiva Hot Yoga 律‍♀️

resp.text: We love that you’re part of the fam, Laura!

name: Amy Burdette
text: I absolutely loved coming back. It's been 4 years since my last class and I'm kicking myself as to why I left for so long! I always feel like a brand new woman walking out of Kiva. Awesome job.

name: ML Davis
text:
I love Kiva. It is beautiful, very clean and everyone who works here is super kind and welcoming. When I first came I had never done yoga before. The teachers were very friendly and helped me a ton! It is an amazing workout and now I'm addicted. My husband is a competitive cyclist and rock climber -- he comes to the class because it builds his core strength and flexibility.

I can't recommend Kiva enough!!

name: Jeff Johnson
text:
Great experience! Great for ‘rehab’ of every kind of sports injury practically. Provides a platform base for every other form of activity movement.

ALL (100%) of the instructors are dedicated and caring individuals who are very knowledgeable and helpful.

Excellent for weight loss also!

resp.text: Great!  Glad to here!  Look forward to seeing you!

name: Hemali Patel
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed my experience at the studio over the last year and a half. The entire staff is very motivating, courteous and friendly. The studio is always very well maintained. I always leave with a very satisfying and fruitful feeling that this is the best thing I've done for myself today. Would highly recommend.

name: Aubrey McCravy
text:
Everything from the atmosphere when you walk in to the atmosphere the instructor creates during the class.My classes at kiva have allowed me to experience a focus in time and awareness. Probably because I’m trying very hard to not die. 😂

I’ve loved every class and can’t wait until my next one! P.s. Mary Lou has a unique training personality that I’ve never encountered anywhere else and I love it! Her ability to lighten the moment and allow true respite through her words and then immediately create a focus and intensity in the next set is incredible.

name: Erin Cornelius
text: "The moment I finished my first class at Kiva Hot Yoga...I was in love with it!  I was welcomed with a huge smile and I just felt I was exactly where I was meant to be.  This group of incredible instructors are so motivating and loving.  Life is challenging and every single time I walk out that door at Kiva...I am stronger than I was when I walked in.  What a beautiful way to approach the world...stronger, more confident, and definitely  equipped just the way we were made to be."

name: Cambro Living
text:
This studio has been life changing. I dropped in having never taken a real yoga class about 5 months ago. I instantly felt at home, and know I would be spending a lot more time here. Since then I have become a member at the studio and have grown to love my teachers, and the other students here. The physical benefits have been awesome, but have been vastly outweighed by the mental and spiritual ones that I never thought I would care about. The staff is incredibly knowledgable, the studio is clean, and the classes are fantastic.
Drop in meet the staff and take a class that will make your week WAY better!

name: Frank McGough
text: Nicole, Pamela, Erin and Mary Lou are the best. Make me feel comfortable as the beginner I am. However truly interested in seeing my progression in Yoga. Great instructors, better people.

resp.text: Thank You!  Great to hear!

name: rebecca gibb
text: Great facility, Superior instructors, variety of classes and times, one always feels welcome with warm friendly faces, clean and well maintained, easy check in and great merchandise!  I highly recommend Kiva Yoga!!!😊😊😊

resp.text: Thanks, Rebecca!

name: ann miljus
text: Kiva hot yoga is life changing. The hot 90 class has made my everyday life more peaceful and centered. My body has become stronger and more balanced.

name: Taylor Berger
text: Great traveler special. Teachers were professional and fun. Studio was really nice - one of the best I’ve been to in almost a decade of practice.

name: Kimberly Paige
text: Great instructors that welcome you to go at your own pace.

resp.text: Thanks, Kimberly!

name: Alyssa Gray
text: I tried out two other Yoga studios before settling into Bikram.  I am a bit of a health nut so I have made Yoga part of my weekly routine for fitness.  I feel much more relaxed and in tune after I leave the studio.  Would recommend to first timers.  Got to give it a shot.

name: Heather Coleman
text: Kate, the owner, is an amazing person and has gathered an amazing group of teachers and staff creating the most wonderful, safe, supportive, empowering environment. I can’t say enough great things.

resp.text: We love you and miss you, Heather! Come back when you can!

name: Kim Cullum
text: The instructors I’ve had so far ensure beginners don’t feel out of place.  I also like the flooring better than carpet that is in most Bikram studios.

name: Ben Cornelius
text: Everything!  Especially the instructor... that Erin Cornelius is special!!  But really the whole experience at Kiva is special.  You can tell it's more than just a YOGA studio... it's a yoga EXPERIENCE!!

name: Nina McBride
text: Well-maintained, clean studio with friendly and helpful staff. Large hot room with great ventilation and even heat. Instructors are all encouraging and well-trained to deliver 26/2 dialogue.  Plenty of class times with variety of offerings. Everything from Bikram to Pilates to Yin classes.   I love coming here whenever I’m in town!

name: Christina Knox
text: I highly recommend Kiva Hot Yoga! The staff is amazing and the studio is always pristine. I look forward to classes and feel SO good after a core body workout!

name: Paula Eckert
text: Very healing environment. The staff is kind and understanding. It's a great place to learn yoga.

name: Lyndsay Blohm
text: The classes are super fun and engaging. The instructors are encouraging and patient. The facility is clean and inviting. Everything was awesome!

name: Mariya Tytell
text: I have been practicing various types of yoga for twenty years.  Their classes are alright.  Nothing special.  But the teachers are VERY RUDE and arrogant.  Now, I know Bikram yoga is supposed to be "tough" and more structured, but these people's rudeness and inappropriate comments cross all bounds of what I would consider "good business practice."  They made me buy a monthly pass to try one class, but I will not be back after the month is up.

name: Angelean Bibb
text: Obtaining a great workout.Sweating out toxins.Improving my mental physical and spiritual wellbeing.Great stress reliever.Gaining strength becoming more flexible.Increasing stamina.Hot yoga gives me an edge in all my other activities (swim,bike,run,golfing,bowling). Mood enhancer.Just a powerful total body work out.

name: Liz Malcom
text:
When i first came to a Hot yoga class at Kiva, i was scared and hadn't done much yoga before, but the teachers really put me at ease by telling me no one has ever died in a Hot yoga class. ha ha. I had been experiencing ongoing back problems since an injury at 19 yr old and after one class my back didn't hurt anymore! I was hooked and kept going back! I loved the way i felt afterward and it has been a transformational 3 years, where my diet has totally changed and I've lost weight and feel great!
Thanks Kiva!
Liz

name: Jessie Chestnut
text: I enjoy the 6:15 am class with Holly. It's a great start to my day!

resp.text: That early morning crowd! You all are a special breed! Much respect!

name: Layla S
text:
The studio and class space is very clean and has some pretty great amenities (showers, towels, etc) that definitely come in handy after a hot yoga class where you've been sweating profusely.

The teachers I've had class with so far were all excellent. They're inclusive, welcoming, generously kind-spirited, and non judgemental - those qualities are what one should expect from a good yoga teacher. The teachers create a great learning environment where every student (not just the advanced ones doing fancy things) feels important and encouraged.

The classes I've taken during the week in the afternoon and evening were both very well attended and had students at all levels mixed in. The teachers did a great job making these all-levels classes interesting and engaging for everyone.

The teachers are exceptionally skilled at recognizing how their students are doing students and adapting the flow of the instruction accordingly. I've seen a number of classes where teachers abandon beginners in down dog or child's pose for 2-3 minutes while they take advanced students through more showy asanas that's always a huge bummer. There's none of that sort of teaching at Kiva, which I love. I'm on the advanced side of things and I was sufficiently challenged by the additional options for intensifying the asanas seamlessly suggested during the classes.

name: Risha Tenae
text: This is the studio where I took my very first Bikram class in 2013. I wasn't new to yoga, had been practicing off and on for 15 years. But, Bikram was intimidating, especially at the large studios in L.A.(where I lived before moving to Birmingham). After taking my first class at Kiva, I was hooked! I loved the studio and the teachers, and Kate. I moved away  from Alabama in 2014 but I took my Bikram practice with me and Kiva will always be "home". They have a great Traveler Package that made this week long trip back to Birmingham even better.

name: Lisa Brown
text: I love the staff and the professional atmosphere ! It has been an amazing journey to wellness .

resp.text: Thank you very much.  We appreciate your comments and will pass them on to our staff.  Look forward to seeing you!

name: Carl Hess
text: Great first time experience for a novice. Invigorating and calming at the same time

resp.text: Glad you had a good experience! Look forward to seeing you!  Thank You!

name: Janet Kavinoky
text: I wanted to attend a yoga class on Saturday afternoon, and Kiva had one scheduled. It was not my first time in a Bikram-style class, so I generally knew what to expect. The studio is comfortable, with cushioned floors, a locker room, and friendly staff (thanks, Taylor!). For first timers: it's hot. No, really, not a joke. Alabama-in-August hot and humid. Take a towel to completely cover your mat, and a hand towel to wipe your face. Hydrate for several hours beforehand in addition to taking an icy cold extra large bottle of water with you to class. Familiarize yourself with the Bikram style before you go--especially if you are used to vinyasa-style classes--and it will help you make it through that first session. I plan to go back regularly, alternating with the other studio I like that offers other kinds of yoga.

resp.text: Thanks for your comments!  Sorry for responding so late!  That is some good advice.  Be sure to check our schedule; we have added some other types of yoga styles...Buti, Barkan, Yoga Flow as well as Yin and Hot Pilates!  Again Thanks!

name: Michelle Jackson
text: Love the positive energy and encouraging spirit of all the instructors! Great variety of classes!

name: Khalia Wilkinson
text: I had an amazing time at Kiva Hot Yoga! The staff was great and very personable.

name: mike finocchiaro
text: The heat is just right, the instructors are awesome and the classes leave you feeling awesome.

resp.text: Great!  We do love our system and glad it was just right for you!  Thanks!

name: LeStryet Yow
text: The staff is excellent and professional, and the studio is top notched.  Enjoyed my year there so far and would highly recommend.

name: Regina Mumford
text: This is such an awesome place to experience Yoga!  The teachers are great and everyone is so friendly you feel right at home!

name: Melinda Higginbotham Green
text:
It took my dear friend over a year to get me to finally attend a Bikram "Hot 26 Yoga" class.  The only reason I returned (within 24 hours) was to avoid being sore.  The way I felt after that 2nd class was unlike anything I had ever experienced.  I was actually craving nutritious foods (not the norm for me, at least not to the point that I was a little disgusted by junk food) and my joints didn't ache like they had for years!!  Hmmm...what was this??? As I listened to the instructors explain the benefits of the tourniquet created by many of the postures I could see how the increased blood flow following the release of the postures, to my body was actually helping/healing!!  That first class was about 3 years ago now and I'm hooked!  It has literally changed my life!
Kate Jenkins is a fabulous owner/curator of yoga...the facility is aesthetically pleasing, comfortable and is always kept in pristine condition (which is no easy chore with all of those sweaty bodies around!) Kate herself is an enthusiastic inspiring instructor and has always maintained a staff of excellent instructors.  Thanks Kate for giving Kiva to Birmingham!

name: Amy Baker Aguirre
text: Discovering Kiva Hot Yoga and regularly practicing the [traditional Bikram style] Hot 26 completely changed my life!  Kiva's teachers and studio make it an excellent place to practice yoga.  The teachers are kind, knowledgable, and encouraging.  The studio is well designed and always clean.  I've tried other yoga studios in town and Kiva is by far my favorite!  I also like that they offer other classes and types of yoga [ex. Buti, Pilates, Yin] while keeping the Hot 26 on the schedule daily.

name: Robin Lewis
text: Too hot for people who can get a little heated but not hot

resp.text: Kiva Little Heated Yoga? We’ll stick with the original recipe. The heat is what helped so many of our students make breakthroughs. We see you’ve never been in our classes yet! We’d love for you to try us!

name: Brad St. George
text: Great atmosphere. Knowledgeable instructors.

name: L M
text: My happy place

resp.text: We are happy you’re here! See you soon!

name: Braelyn Keana
text: Very powerful & relaxing!

resp.text: Terrific!  That's what we aim for and glad that you experienced it!

name: Josh kaley
text: Great place. Nice facilities, super clean. Friendly staff

name: cody hallford
text: NOT HAPPY ABOUT FALSE HOURS!! I recently decided to start going to the gym and working out....im a Blount county local.the gym was on the top of the list....GREAT PLACE!! but I havent committed to full membership yet...the website says they close at 10...so I came in tonight and found out that they closed at 9 instead of 10..i would have payed the 15 guest fee for 2 hours,but not 1...and the girl working really did nothing to help!! Other than that,its a great place!!thanks

name: Judah Hollis
text: Great place to work out. Really pricey though.

name: BON ES
text:
Gym is fine
Pool is fun.
Management is unprofessional dealing with childcare issues. If you have children staying with morning shift keep a check in on your little ones. Issues with gate being left open. Caregiver falling asleep and on her phone all time.😡

name: sandra morris
text: This is a great workout facility. Always clean and friendly staff.

name: Becca Caroline
text: The pool was soo dirty

name: James R
text: Nice place to work out without having to wait on machine and have annoying teenagers running around and acting like fools. People come here to workout and it's noticeable!

name: Daniella Delcamp
text: Indoor swimming pool is Olympic style and heated. Great place to run.

name: Lisa Lovell
text: Great place to work out. Friendly staff. The pool is wonderful.

name: Mike Wooley
text: I tried giving them a second chance. Years ago, there were problems with the cleanliness of the pool and hot tub. I joined last year and tried using the facilities but not much has changed. Every time I went, there was sand and other items on the bottom of the pool. The water was so cold that it would cause my back to hurt. The hot tub was either broken down or dirty every day I went. They get you to sign a 1 year contract so I have been paying for a service that I really would like to have used, but I refuse to put my body through this process. I haven't seen any improvement from years ago to now. Too bad, they have such potential.

name: Carole Lands
text: Loved the deep water aerobics class on Tuesday night wish you had more than one time a week. Also need more belts for those who are not good swimmers

name: Georgia Gay
text: Nice people haven't used that gym yet but would

name: Earl Seames
text: Great workout gym these people have EVERYTHING  YOU NEED!

name: Karen Murphy
text: Offers great classes,  pool, and spa. Friendly staff. Great for families

name: Rodney Putman
text: Great gym to workout in Great staff Good instrustors

name: JesuTrend
text: This place is great and fun for all ages. Great place

name: Chris Mahan
text: Nice, clean, friendly environment that motivates me to become a better and more healthy person.

name: Wanda Yates
text: Helpful staff encourages and inspires for a good workout.

name: Lynette Burkey
text: Just joined and cannot wait to get started! The place is clean and well equipped.

text: Freaking Awesome

text: Love it

text: LOVE it!!!!

name: Hilda G Guevara
text:
(Translated by Google) The service is good.

(Original)
El servicio es bueno.

name: Chelle Ham
text: Had a wonderful first session of beginners yoga yesterday! Nichole is so kind and a great teacher. The interior of the studio is very calming and the session itself was simple enough to follow along with for a beginner with some challenges to encourage learning. My husband went along with me and loved the session too! So happy to have found this studio in Dothan. I will be back!

resp.text: Thank you soooo much!!!  I'm so happy you enjoyed your experience :)  Looking forward to seeing you soon at the studio!!!! ~ Virginia

name: Susan Avello
text:
As a Personal Chef in Dothan AL specializing in Healthy food and Nutrition, my first yoga experience when I returned from Chicago was Nature Gallery and what a wonderful journey it has been.

Gretchen and her team is extremely knowledgeable, acceptable, kind and loving and help you no matter what level of expertise. They believe in giving back to the community and it shows! Their studio is warm and inviting and every class leaves you feeling uplifted and calm - ready to take on anything!

From fabulous massages by Jason to the numerous classes offered at Nature Gallery you will find a loving and accepting staff and classmates as you surround yourself in the beauty of art in this lovely atmosphere of warmth.

Namaste

name: Christy Carter
text: I have been doing vibration therapy on a regular basis for 3 months now and the cumulative effects are really noticeable.  A therapy session is relaxing and meditative.  Jason helps you find the perfect position for your session for comfort.  My sleep has improved, my overall mood, my outlook, pain in joints completely gone after a session.  If I am going through something tough I always book a session and it helps me through it.  I would recommend strongly you  try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Christy!!!

name: Stephanie Paulding
text: What a wonderful place to practice yoga! Beautiful atmosphere; great teachers! The Sound Bath is amazing also.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stephanie!!!

name: diane braun
text: I've consistently taken Yoga classes at The Nature Gallery for going on 2 years now.  I even participated in their first Peaceful Warrior Teaching Training Series, which was an incredible and life-changing experience that I recommend to everyone!  They offer a variety of classes for different yoga styles, and various class times to meet most anyone's schedule.  The teachers, and all the staff for that matter, are awesome!  I can't say enough good things about The Nature Gallery!

name: Nature Gallery
text:
Austin Prince ~
I'm truly sorry your experience wasn't up to your standards.  We are all human... we have good & not so good days.  I'm very sorry that one crummy experience rushed you to jump on your electronic device & write a not so nice review.  Your credit card was fully refunded and we offered nothing but sincere apologies.  You were overly nice on the phone with us, which was odd after reading your yucky review.  Your wife was very sweet, we enjoyed meeting her :)  Maybe you should give our YOGA classes a chance... I assure you, your money won't be wasted there ~ $10 per class with an awesome team of Instructors.  Congratulations on your new little bundle of Joy!!!  ~ Namaste ~

name: Hope Richardson
text: The atmosphere is serene.. I had a massage by Jason. I could not walk without pain when I went to him. Every muscle in my lower legs where locked up. Jason did myofascial methods on my legs and I felt and feel so much better. Thank you Jason.  Thank you for your passion.

name: Cathy Prange
text: Just experienced Vibrational Sound Therapy with Singing Bowls with Jason Watford....WOW !!! I went in stressed and left feeling peaceful and at the same time energized, the sounds from the bowls resonated with my soul and the vibrations from the bowls seemed to know what my body needed and wanted !!!! Thank you Jason and The Nature Gallery Yoga and Massage Studio.

resp.text: So happy you enjoyed your experience!!!

name: Danielle Fisher
text: Love the energy at Shoals Yoga! I did my teacher training here and loved every minute of it! Danielle is such a loving, gentle soul! She and the other instructors do a great job. They always make you feel comfortable and you leave with such lightness! I love practicing yoga in the atmosphere they provide!

name: Brittney Mashburn
text: Danielle is the most loving and caring person! She is able to express that through everything she does at this studio. Her classes are so thought out and enjoyable. Every time I go I leave with a sense of ease and optimism. If you're looking for a great yoga teacher and studio this is the one for you!

name: Alicia Donlan
text: An absolutely warm and inviting space to practice yoga. The instructors are knowledgeable, kind, professional and humble. I’m so sad that I moved away from this amazing yoga home. I have not yet found a studio that compares.

name: Samantha Mitchell
text: Danielle has been such a blessing to our community. She is very passionate about not only her business but each and every person that walks through the door. She has even travelled to local nursing facilities to teach the elderly and local school to teach children the importance of yoga practices. I highly recommend Shoals Yoga if you are interested in yoga. She will get you on the right path.

name: Erin Lier
text: I just took a beginner's yoga class with Ella and it was great! She is a very welcoming and talented teacher.

name: Casey Aldrup
text: I love coming to Shoals yoga! The pricing is fair, the teachers are experienced and knowledgeable, and the classroom environment is always warm and inviting. I feel like I can relax while still getting a workout, too! I will definitely continue to attend classes here.

name: Ashley Morrow Colonna
text: Danielle is a mindful, thoughtful instructor. So much so that when our community was able to host a TedX event, Danielle lead the crowd in a mindfulness exercise. I wouldn’t hesitate to do business with her if you are looking for a yoga studio to practice!

name: Dona Hill
text: I have attended Shoals Yoga for several years.  Each class is encouraging, enlightening. I have recommended this studio to many and will continue to do so. Thank you to Shoals Yoga.

name: Karen Williams
text: Best yoga studio in the Shoals.  Danielle is truly one of the kindest people you will ever meet!

name: Mary Parker
text: Wonderful community with a transparent and authentic leader.

name: Cassie McDonald
text: I saw Danielle take money from a person that had just been through an extremely devastating event.  She had the opportunity to give, but chose to take.  Beware.  Just because someone calls themselves a "yogi" and wears Lululemon, does not mean they follow the true spirituality of yoga.  It was disappointing to see.

name: Sara E
text: Great ladies. Great love.

name: Rachel Irwin
text: I have had many of their treatments and used many of the products they offer. If you are looking for anything from weight loss to a facial you need to contact this place today! Support your local small businesses, you will be glad you did!

name: Michelle Murrill
text: I have been here several times for chemical peels and facials and have been very happy with the quality of services, the friendliness of the staff and the overall experience of the spa. I love this place! Highly recommend.

name: Daniel Haddox
text: Amazing and caring staff! Misty, Sherine and Zoe are all super people to work with and for sure care about you and your needs. I’ve done the Botox and the IV hydration there several times and definitely will be back!  Thanks guys!

name: Holman Bowen
text: Always has excellent service, I received a laser hair removal treatment and I am more than pleased with the results. Definitely will be returning!

name: Vicki Harris
text: Amazing staff, state of the art facility and the products have made a difference in my complexion.  The night time serum is super.  My favorite items are the facial with derma-planing and facial hair removal. Go see Misty, Sherine and Zoe, tell them I sent you!!

name: Hope Robinson
text:
Beautiful office and excellent service. Go see Zoë for the ZO 3 step peel. It’s a game changer!
Absolutely will be back 😊

name: Leigh Wright
text: The BEST place in Baldwin County and Mobile County for weight loss, chemical peels, laser hair removal, you name it! Always worth the trip to Spanish Fort.

name: Janna Jellison
text: Very hospitable receptionist, went above and beyond with customer service. Dr. Dyas was very friendly and knowledgeable, took her time to answer all of my questions. I was highly impressed with their service

name: Tina Burner
text: Best Yoga Studio I have ever been too! They are the most welcoming people I have ever been around. I never felt out of place & they always provided such a pleasant experience.

name: Alison Herlihy
text: Glow is an amazing community! They have a great variety of classes and the classes can be accommodated for all fitness levels. When I first went to Glow, I was a little intimated by hot yoga, but now I am a believer.

name: Jackie Hawkins
text: I love this place. Easy going, no pressure, no problems. I can easily plan times to go around my busy schedule thanks to the 530a classes. A lot of other yoga studios in the area I looked at didn’t have weekend, night, or early morning classes which always made it difficult to try something new.  I haven’t found an instructor I don’t like and I love the special events                (especially the ones that they partner with other businesses). I really look forward to continuing with Glow.

name: Danelle Adair
text: When I decided to join a yoga studio, I looked local studios around town and when Glow Yoga popped up, I knew this studio was the right one for me. The good vibes I felt when I stepped into the front door confirmed how I felt when I saw the website. The teachers are so friendly, knowledgeable, and make classes fun. Namaste Glow Yoga family. ✨🧘🏻‍♀️✨

name: Marbury Buckhaults
text: From the first moment I felt a part of the Glow family and yet we are given that gentle shove needed that produces results. Can't say enough good things!

name: Jacquelyn East
text: Glow Yoga is a very welcoming studio. You can practice here at any level. When I first started practicing yoga at Glow, I was a beginner. It has been a wonderful journey to watch my practice grow and my body become stronger. No more back problems.

name: Emilee Shuler
text: From my very first day at Glow Yoga Mobile, I have felt completely welcome and comfortable. Soon after starting classes there, I began to realize that this place is not just a yoga studio. It's a safe place where like minded people can go to practice yoga, but also a community in which everyone supports and encourages each other. I enjoyed it so much that I began the teacher training, and it is one of the best things that's ever happened to me. I'm not only learning the physical aspects of yoga and how to teach it, but how to incorporate it into my day to day life. I am learning so much about myself and life in general. I could go on and on!

name: Melissa Byrd
text: Having tried many yoga classes, I never really felt connected to the practice or the classes until I began going to Glow Yoga.  I entered feeling very intimidated but left with a sense of community and peace.  The studio and the staff are so welcoming and inspiring.  I began practicing here at a very vulnerable time in my life having faced many terrible tragic losses, yet due to the constant positive energy, I was hooked.  I am now teaching yoga and thriving both on and off of the mat!  I cannot thank them enough for changing my life, one breath, one hour at a time!

name: addie hanson
text: Such an awesome environment--I am brand new to yoga and everyone was so welcoming and helpful! Can't wait to go back and finish my 30 days for $30 special. They also have an awesome selection of workout gear including Lululemon (so cute!!)

name: Gail Harrington
text: Changes your body and your mind .I feel stronger after every class.The instructors are so encouraging and positive. For me, it's a great way to end a stressful day.

name: Jacqueline Beverly
text: Original location is in Gulf Shores, AL, but the Mobile studio has the same welcoming, friendly, and relaxed vibe. You will get a great workout for your body and mind! Plus, they sell Lululemon!

name: Kristin O'Connell
text: Judgment-free, all skill levels welcome and super happy environment. Love Glow Yoga so much!

name: Jennifer Heitman
text: Best Lululemon selection in southern Alabama. If you love Lululemon, you should definitely check out this studio. Great location in Springhill. Stay for some amazing yoga too!

name: Tara Brown
text: I love Glow yoga!! Great people and wonderful yoga!!

name: Rachel Fulmer
text: Perfect Location with a great community!

name: Cinna buunnzz
text: Love it!

name: Mark Fisher
text: Big roomy gym. Clean. Generally well behaved people work out there in all shapes and sizes. I rarely have to wait for equipment. Staff has always been pretty friendly but I didn't appreciate getting booted out early on Fat Tuesday when I had just started my workout. When equipment gets broken it can be down for a long time. I've never been impressed with the trainers there. Other gyms are cheaper and depending on the time of day less crowded but I think it's better than planet fitness. PF doesn't have a free weight squat rack which for someone who is serious about weight training is absolutely silly. Omni needs to fix its gear and also get the movie room up and running again. Put someone who loves children in the  daycare too. It's one of your big selling points for cryin out loud. Overall though a good gym.

name: Raw Rodney
text: This is a great gym. Most of the staff are friendly and the gym is spacious. There are a variety of workout items leaving lots of room for versatility. They even have a movie theater that can be utilized while running on the tread mill. No other gym has this in Mobile, AL. The atmosphere is very laid back. I highly recommend this gym to everyone.

name: Austin F.
text: So, what they don't elaborate on is that the "2 weeks free" is only an option if you're singing up for a 1 year contract. However, I wasn't informed of this until I got to the gym, and spoke to two employees at the front desk and they were neither friendly nor seemed to want to help me. The gym itself is large and really nice though, but I didn't want to spend my money there after encountering the aforementioned individuals.

name: Marco Silva
text:
The best gym I have ever joined. Very clean, very nice staff, excellent equipment !
The gym is HUGE with tons of machines ! The free weight section is perfect, plus they have a lot of benches.

You won't find a better gym in the area.

name: Zionette Cleek
text:
Fantastic workout facility!  Plenty of fitness options ( Yoga, Fitness Classes, Cycle Room, etc..) as well as a woman's only workout room which allows additional workout space and not to mention machine accessibility :) Friendly welcoming staff, along with a tanning club located next door as an option.

Z

name: john cole
text: We were told that they would be closing for remodeling but members would be able to go to the new sister location on Hillcrest because it would be up and running before the. Now Gym is closed and a week later the Hillcrest location is still not open. This is a major inconvenience. I try calling both the Hillcrest and Airport numbers and no answer. Very unprofessional. I think they made sure everybody renewed their membership before closing down just for this reason.

name: K D
text: Work out area is nice, but, disappointed with their classes. Only one Zumba class a week and have it in a hot room with rubber floors and no mirror. That's how you get injuries. No Pound classes either.

name: Adam Jacobs
text: Gym is great. Had to cancel because the child care center was not up to par. My son didn't feel comfortable there and for obvious reasons. The staff members all sat on their phones, a lot of times with their backs to the kids. One time when I dropped my son off, both child care workers walked out of the room & left me in there with all of the children. That was my last straw & I cancelled. I hope someone does something about this & gives the child care workers a formal training in taking care of children. And the gym should at least seek to hire people who like children. They certainly shouldn't be on their phones. And kids should be greeted warmly with a smile.

name: Muscle Trucking
text: Nice gym... very well equipped.... cleanliness could do a touch up....

name: Alisha Carruthers
text: Christian "CJ" is AWESOME!!!! I left my RX rope while visiting their facility on vacation. One morning after I got back I went to grab my rope to practice for an upcoming Crossfit Comp, and noticed my rope was gone. I HAD TO HAVE THIS ROPE FOR MY COMPETITION. I immediately called and asked if my rope was there and sure enough he found it! He went above and beyond when he got off and overnighted it to me to ensure I would receive it by the weekend, just in time for my comp!! Not many people would go out of their way like he did, and I am so appreciative of his kindness!! Ten thumbs up!!!

name: Stang Dhanesnit
text: I wish they open 24 hours or at least 11 to midnight. Many people sometimes has to wait until their kids sleep to be able to come out. I bet if Omni does this, Gym like planet fitness will go out of business soon

name: Peck Proctor
text: Great place employees are fantastic and extremely helpful the manager is extremely knowledgeable and so are the trainers I recommend this gym to everyone

name: Jessie Brumfield
text: I've been going to the gym for over 6 months now and I can finally put a proper review of the place. They strive to keep the gym a clean, fully functional facility. Sure there may be a broken machine or a shower not working, but I do see these things get repaired in a pretty timely manner. They are currently doing renovations/improvements on items that need it. In my opinion, they are not OVERLY nice and they are not rude. They are polite, professional and basically just a "no bullsh*t" gym. They have the most workout equipment I've seen in any gym of Mobile. And UNLIKE Planet Fitness, they actually promote FITNESS (not pizza, doughnuts and being judgmental to anyone that works out hard to get the body they have). It's a good gym, I would definitely recommend it to anyone that is not a whiny baby.

name: Jeff Oglesby
text: It's a good gym, free weights, machines, cross fit room. It's not that luxurious but who really cares? Go stand at planet fitness waiting on a smith machine or come here and lift iron. All the comments about rude staff is inaccurate, no they don't seek to be your best friend but that isn't what gym workers are supposed to do. I get a "have a good workout" on my way in and a "take it easy brother" on the way out, it's all I need. I will say though watching their personal trainers, I wouldn't hire them. Their clients don't make alot of progress, haven't used them personally though and it could be the client not following the plan correctly.

name: Jamie Busby
text: Overall, I had an uncomfortable experience with the place. The employees are rude and do not give a crap about you; just your money. People there are incredibly judgemental. I went to get a protein shake at the counter and the man said "are you sure you want one of these kinds of shakes skinny guy?" Horrible experience. Find another gym that isn't full of judging people.

name: Colin Hartery
text: Things are getting better with the new management. Still some broken equipment and things that could use repair but things are changing for the better

name: Casey Chambliss
text: Great place great people love the atmosphere affordable and fun. Great staff

name: A Google User
text: The group exercise schedule is packed full of variety and the teachers are great.  So far my favorites are yoga, thighs butt and gut, and cardio/tone.  If you are into cardio equipment, they have a ton.  I was told you never have to wait.   To the moms out there, they also have daycare.

name: Cassidy Cooper
text: The facility is large and clean with a wide variety of machines and equipment. The group classes are great!

name: Barry Langley
text: . Decent gym, poor management and/or computer software. There are repeated issues with automatic payment by credit card. Moving on to Sportplex. No hassles there.

name: First Last
text: This is a terrible gym. If you move away and try and cancel your membership the gym manager is never there and does not return phone calls.  After finally getting the manager on the phone and sending him the paperwork that he requested they they STILL did not cancel my membership.  4 months later I gave up on the gym manager and contacted National Fitness who does their billing and had to RESEND by postal mail more paperwork.  My membership STILL isn't cancelled. They just give you the run around so they can keep taking your money. I doubt I'll ever see a refund for the last 4 months that I have not been in the state to use the gym.

name: William Torphy
text: The equipment seems old and it doesn't seem like they've invested in new equipment, especially cardio machines for years. It seems to cater to body builders but even the weightlifting equipment seems dated to me. The carpet is old and it took forever to fix the urinal in the men's room which was disgusting. Also annoying is how they seem to have less and less bodypump classes. However the classes themselves are great (excellent instructor) when they have them. It doesn't seem like they are maintaining the gym properly and I will be going elsewhere. I do enjoy the theatre room when it's running as it makes the time go by. But overall not worth what I'm paying imo.

name: Natalie C
text:
Here is the problem with this gym. It started off pretty good and then it went down here, but I blame corporate for that. Back when they first opened, they were charging $55 a month for this place which at the time, made sense because all the equipment was new and they have four and five of the exact same machine; ensuring that no matter what you did, you always had a free machine. However, as the equipment started to crack & deteriorate, it has not been maintained right. That was too much to charge so people left and now you can start off here for about $34 a month.

Apparently, the owners don't like this because they shut down the smoothie shop. They've closed off a lot of the rooms that we used to be able to go in and use and multitude of requests have been put in to fix certain equipment that never gets around to being fixed. They just got weight pins because people kept taking weight pins out of some machines to use them in others and we had to beg for about a month to get that. The yoga room used to be open to me where I could go in and use the exercise balls (because the ladies only room has only one ball and it is severely deflated.) I never messed up the room, but others did and now everyone else is being punished and is not allowed to use the room, but our dollars pay for the equipment. No one seems to know where a damn air pump is so they can inflate their own balls. It's ridiculous. If you going to the theater room, there is a graveyard of broken equipment and that they refused to fix or replace. They also have torn up machines in the food court and in the rooms that the clientele don't normally frequent. Why keep it if it's broken and you don't want to fix it?

To add insult to injury, we have to pay a $40 fee once a year for the equipment, but a lot of this equipment looks like it hasn't been changed out in years. To literally lock away a room full of equipment from members who haven't messed it up is wrong. Meanwhile, they have a set of high school kids that come in here tearing up the equipment all the time and being loud and using slurs that everybody has literally complain about, yet they are allowed to continue working out here. All of the quality Equipment is sealed off in some room somewhere while everyone else is left to use what's left.

There are ants in the ladies sauna that I ask the boys to tell the head girl about so it could be taken care of. They never told her and I had to tell her myself. I ended up getting bitten and I have welts on my arms from the ant bites. It has been about 4 days since I told someone about it and it still hasn't been taken care of. The manager here is really cool, but he doesn't move unless corporate gets involved.

Furthermore, they won't stop hiring college kids to work here and they're not paying them all that much so they're simply not going to do the job. On the weekends, they work out on the clock  when they don't think they're going to get caught. Trash is overflowing in the restrooms, dirt is on the floor and a lot of the equipment is jammed up when you try to use it. They don't regularly check the paper towels towels or anything. There are far too many $10 a month gyms running around here for this. Between Pro Health, Sportsplex and the YMCAs, I'm sure I can find somewhere else that will find equipment that is quality.

name: derek barefoot
text: This is in response to Justa Mom.  I am Derek Barefoot the manager of Omni fitness.  Words can't describe how incredibly offended I am by your post.  I am the father of am amazing little girl who stays in the child care while I work.  I go in the child care to check on her.  The fact that you would suggest drug use or PERVERSION!! on my part is out of my realm of comprehension.  Before you, or any one else "speculate" why not come talk to me.  I am in the gym M-F 9am-7pm.  I am a man of high moral standards and reading your post made me sick to my stomach.

And, good grief, turn the water pressure up on the water fountain! Please!

name: Giselle Hollie
text: I’ve been a member at Forge Fitness since 2017! Since the first day I dropped in to check out what CrossFit was all about I’ve been impressed with the professionalism and enthusiasm displayed by the coaches and owners and the sense of community. The owners are awesome and I even got my tire changed by Rich one time! I now have a 13 month old and since he was 6 weeks he’s been going to the gym with me and everyone has been awesome around him! During the pandemic the gym took extra precautions to keep staff and athletes safe. Equipment was cleaned daily, athletes had designated spaces, and when everyone was at home the coaches took videos and sent us At Home WOd’s to keep everyone motivated and moving. I’ve grown so much as an athlete at Forge and I’m stronger and fitter than before I joined. I’m glad to be part of this special community!!!

text: I have been going to Forge since 2017. It's great. The coaches are knowledgeable and the community is fun to be around. It's a family owned business and you can tell. I definitely recommend Forge to anyone looking for a gym. I found it doing an internet search in 2017 when I moved to Birmingham and it's been a wonderful experience.

name: Hannah Grant
text: If you are looking for a gym that will take you in as you are and motivate you, this is the place. I am going on 8 months with this bunch and its hands down the best choice I could have ever made! The second you walk in the door on day one you are greeted with friendly, helpful, smiling faces. You will quickly NOT be a stranger! The members and coaches of Forge do not care if it is your first day ever in a gym, first time trying Crossfit,  if you are a scaled or  RX+ athlete, new mother getting back on your fitness journey, whether you're in your 20's or 50's, you will always get cheered on, coached, and pushed the same the same every single day in the best, positive way. With some of the best programming around, the coaches make it easy to be a better you.  They meet you where you are based off your bodies needs whether that's doing 1 rep or 15. Your gym friends quickly become your gym FAMILY that you stay after class with, and share laughs and good talks with. It becomes the best part of your everyday routine. Forge Fitness also features recovery shop options, sauna, childcare, cardio room, basketball court, soccer field, and track. There's a place for all members of your family here. I have been a member to multiple gyms across Eastern-Central Alabama, and you won't find another  home gym like this!

resp.text: This is hands down one of the most thoughtful review we have ever received. We truly appreciate you and all the support!!

The facilities are fantastic (they have showers so you can get back to work after a class), and I love being a part of Forge Fitness! No complaints! Come try it out! They let me attend a few classes before deciding if it was a fit for me or not, so come try for yourself!

You'll obviously only get out what you put into it, but all of the coaches are very knowledgeable and more than happy to discuss proper form, nutrition, supplements, etc. with you as well as demonstrate the correct technique of the different lifts when asked.
