resp.text: Thanks for the review. Keep them coming.

name: Stephanie Odle
text: Great community. Great coaching. Great workouts. Love this Crossfit  family. I came to Forge wanting to improve and ramp up my training. Forge has helped me do that. If you're looking for a Crossfit community, you'll find it here.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie for the awesome review and we really love having you as part of the Forge family.

name: Alphonso Lewis
text: Amazing workouts with a collection of competitive individuals. You could call everybody there one big competitive and  fit family

resp.text: Thank you Alphonso and we love your energy in the gym. The morning crew is looking forward to seeing you at 5:30am.

name: Justin Lobdell
text: Great facility with exceptional trainers that work one-on-one with you to secure your health/safety as well as push you to enhance your fitness skills/level!

resp.text: Thank you so much Justin for the awesome review. We appreciate you supporting Forge Fitness!

name: Brad Barber
text: Big box and a very friendly welcome when I dropped in. I’d definitely recommend Forge!

resp.text: Thank you Brad for dropping in and please come see us again.

name: Sarah Lawson
text: Great space with clean equipment and helpful, friendly staff. Plenty of parking. I'm not a crossfitter myself but I visited with a friend and was impressed by Forge and the people here!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

name: Bradley Davidson
text: Great experience for a great value. Caleb Dodd is a great coach and motivator. Class times and locations are perfect for anyone, espcially for those who live or work over the mountain.

resp.text: Thank you BRADLEY for the feedback. We look forward to seeing back in the gym this week.

name: Rodney Overstreet
text: I visited this box last Sat for their inaugural WOD. It was really tough and fun. Full disclosure: Rich & Chris are friends of mine. However, they are also enthusiastic, friendly, & knowledgable coaches. The space is large and well designed. I can recommend this box without reservation.

resp.text: Thank you Rodney for all the support!

name: Matt Mogle
text: Great gym with a great community. I've been to other Crossfit gyms around the World and this one is special. It's an incredibly encouraging environment and a wonderful place to watch people continue to get better and excel every day. Really cool to see your seasoned Crossfit veterans working out right next to beginners and encouraging one another throughout.

name: Deborah Pennino
text: Great close-knitted gym with experienced and friendly staff.  It is very clean and has excellent equipment for workouts.

resp.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review!

name: Clarisse Jackson
text: I've never crossFit before and after searching for different gyms, I couldn't be happier to have chosen Forge. The atmosphere, the people and best of all the owners Chris and Rich show true commitment to their members and are able to push you to your limits in the safest way possible. I've tried different classes and exercises but was never constant because I will get bored, well let me tell you; I haven't gotten bored since I started going to Forge, it has been 9 months so far and I don't want to stop. I look forward to my classes and to the people that I've met at the gym. Plus is clean, has A/C and they put great music. So if you are looking into CrossFit in this area, this is the place to be!!!

resp.text: You are awesome and we truly appreciate your support!

name: Stacey Hood
text: Great gym, been to several others, but this place is top level and professional from the moment you walk in. It's everything that anyone could ever want in a CrossFit gym.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback and we appreciate the support!

name: Brooks Gant
text: Cannot say enough good things about Forge Fitness in Vestavia! Coming from a cycling and running background, I was burnt out and looking for something new and challenging. After speaking with several crossfit gyms in the area, something just felt "right" about Forge and so I joined the 101 class. 9 months later I am probably in the best overall shape I have ever been in! From all the coaches who truly care about their athletes, to the positive and encouraging atmosphere, as well as all the great people I have met, if you have ever thought about giving crossfit a try, I highly recommend checking out Forge Fitness.

resp.text: Wow Brooks, thank you for the awesome review and we truly love having you as a solid member of the Forge Family. Keep up the great work!

name: Sharon A. Moskowitz
text: CrossFit Shades / Forge Fitness is awesome.  I travel to the Birmingham area for work once a month and was looking for a gym/box that has hours on Sunday.  I had heard some not-so-great things about a few boxes but I hadn't heard of Forge Fitness/ CF Shades.  Not only is CF Shades the only place with Sunday hours, but they were above and beyond wonderfully welcoming when I showed up unannounced during their open gym period.  Upon first glance, the gym was very clean, which is not very common among CrossFit and Crossfit-inspired facilities.  The owner, Rich, jumped up from a staff meeting and gave me a tour and after learning of my CF history, invited me to use any and all of their space as well as invited me back through my duration of stay while in town.  They have an awesome workout space out back with a platform, squat racks and a rig and the running course around the building is super safe.  I also met coaches Caleb, Josh and Rebecca who were all very accommodating and friendly.  When I returned for a class, Rebecca coached and I really appreciated her attentiveness.  I'm a CrossFit coach in Denver and because I move relatively well, I tend to get left alone - but I love being coached when I drop into new places and Rebecca was great.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND travelers and locals to visit.  If you're a member somewhere else in Hometown or Birmingham, switch now.   I'll be back there for sure when I'm in town next.

resp.text: Hey Sharon, Thank you very much for this amazing review. This has to be the best review anyone could ever receive. We truly appreciate what you are doing and we look forward to seeing you next time you are back in the area.

name: Justin Missanelli
text: Friendly environment for fitness.  Competitive for those serious workout fiends. Don't let the afternoon classes intimidate you though, the people are friendly if you just talk to them.

name: Clay Conner
text: Great gym, great people and great results! Highly recommended.

resp.text: You left out great programming and great workouts. We love you Clay and we appreciate everything you do for Forge.

name: Nicole Dilg Beachum
text: The trainers at Forge are great. If you want to try CrossFit, this is the place to go in Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you for your support!

name: desandra martinez
text: Awesome! Great workouts

resp.text: Thank you for the review and come see us the next time you are in town.

name: Conrad Taylor
text: Great gym. Great athletes. Great community!

resp.text: Thank you for our awesome review.

name: James LeCroy
text: Started working out here over 2 years ago and have regretted one minute of it.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.

name: Garrett Doss
text: Can't go wrong.  Great gym!

resp.text: My man Garret. Thank you for the review and being awesome!

name: Joe Ross Merritt
text: Best Crossfit experience in Birmingham.  Great coaching and community..

resp.text: Thank you Joe Ross and we appreciate your support. We look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Forge Fitness Powered by CrossFit Shades
text: We appreciate our community and want to thank everyone for the support we've received from our members and their families since we've been open. Our members make it all happen.

name: Joey Beachum
text: Great gym. If you want to get in shape, there's no better place in Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you Joey for the support!

name: Ploppy
text: Just awesome place!

resp.text: Thank you Austin for the review!!

name: Kelly Doss
text: Great place! Convenient and accessible.

resp.text: Thank you Kelly for the awesome review!

name: samuel walthall
text: Awesome gym. The best coaches!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback!

name: Todd Hollifield
text: Great trainers and great athletes.

resp.text: Thank you Todd for the review and we greatly appreciate your support of Forge.

name: Nate Mothershed
text: Great place. Treated like FAMILY!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome feedback!

name: Brandon Stewart
text: Great Gym, great people!

resp.text: Thank you for the review. It's been awesome training with you for the last 5 years. Also, it's awesome seeing your passion for fitness and life. Thank you for being apart of the Forge family.

name: Jackson McMillan
text: Owner super nice, great guy. Awesome facility has everything you will need.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and appreciate the support!

name: Daniel Pritchett
text: If you are looking for a clean and spacious gym with an abundant supply of the nicest equipment in town then Quad is your spot. I have dropped into Quad a few times. The people who make up Quad are the most friendly and motivating individuals you can meet. If you are in the area I would 100% check this place out.

resp.text: Thank you brother for the feedback and we greatly appreciate all the support!

name: Sarah Ladick
text: Quad is an awesome place to train. The facility is so spacious, clean and all the equipment is well taken care of. The coaches that lead the classes help you every step of the way. Everyone is so friendly you feel like family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: You are family and it’s awesome to have you and the family working out with us again!

name: Grant Scoble
text: Quad did an excellent job of getting me back in the game. I also was able to learn best practices for recovery by having their recovery center available with my membership. You feel apart of a family as soon as you walk in.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and all the support!

name: Justin Lobdell
text: Everything you need under one roof! Awesome group fitness, one on one training, full size basketball court and a recovery shop. Great coaches who truly care about your well being and push you to get better every day!

resp.text: You are the greatest!!

name: Haleigh Chastain
text: Best facility in Birmingham! The gym has everything you need to train. Nicest equipment around town.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review and always being such an awesome customer!

name: Regan Claire Hibbs
text: What doesn't The Quad have?! Whether you want to have an intense crossfit workout with Forge, or a good stretch at Steel City yoga you can do it all right here. The recovery center is so nice too, and I want to try the NormaTec Boots that they have in there! Everyone here is so friendly and works together well.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review and checking everyone out!

name: Jessica Lovel
text: Best facility in Birmingham! It has it all! CrossFit, yoga, sports massage and recovery, and personal training!! Great family atmosphere for me and my daughter!

resp.text: We got it all and it is because of the support of people like you.

name: Tyler Thompson
text: Great atmosphere and great people! Great place to get a good workout in.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback TNT!

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Did a Google 360 tour of this business...wonderful place!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 360 and the support!

name: Clay Conner
text: The best fitness facility and family in Birmingham!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. We greatly appreciate the support.

name: B. Morgan
text: I attended a chair yoga class and loved it.  I am a senior citizen who needs to keep flexible.  Breezeville Yoga offers other classes of yoga.  I recommend it highly.

name: Val Acosta
text: This is a great studio. I dropped in for a class during a short business trip to the area. The studio is beautiful, the Instructor (Hannah I believe) was amazing! I did Level 2 Hot Yoga. It was full but not crowded and it was SO HOT! I felt very welcomed even though I had never been there before. There are mats, towels and water available. After class while I waited for my Uber, Hannah waited with me so I wouldn't be alone. I will be returning to this studio during my next business trip.

name: Margaret Pittman
text: Fantastic teachers and a wonderful atmosphere.  Breezeville is great no matter what level of yoga you're comfortable with.

name: Erik Schweiss
text: I'm out here for only a month but I am digging breezeville yoga. I have done yoga a few times in the past but I was never hooked on it and only tried it maybe once a year.  Some friends convinced me to go and it was the best decsion! I am having a ton of fun and I feel comfortable there at the studio trying and sometimes failing at the different positions.  Their instructors are awesome and they care about you and your experience.  If you have never gone go take a class with Breeze! He is awesome and I love his leading style.

name: James Lee V
text:
Breeze is a great yoga teacher and Breezeville is a wonderful yoga studio.
100% reccomended.

name: Birdie B
text: This studio has a fantastic variety of classes and instructors! I love the unity and peaceful atmosphere of Breezeville! I need my yoga!!

name: holly martin
text: Atmosphere and experience was amazing highly recommend Frank

name: Meg Lewis
text: Great instruction, great yoga family, and Frank continues to make this space itself more and more beautiful and welcoming. Nice variety of classes, including heated and hot options.

name: Rheanna Sinnett
text: Lovely yoga studio with solid instruction and truly kind people.

name: helen woodall
text: An absolutely wonderful experience. I highly recommend it. I will be going back regularly.

name: Danny Stephens
text: Good vibes through and through. A place for anyone at any level in yoga and Frank is the truth. High recommendation for sure.

name: Tereza U Ancelet
text: Attended my first class and loved it.  Great place.  Will definitely go again.

name: Rickey Moore
text: Had my first class tonight and it was an absolute joy... not threatening at all and very relaxing... I look forward to many more classes.

name: Lorraine Adams
text: What a wonderful place!  Amelia makes everyone feel at home, and like part of a family.  I have learned so much from her!

name: Heather Cole
text: I moved from Nashville almost 2 years ago and immediately looked for a hot yoga studio. This studio far exceeded my expectations! I’ve enjoyed every class I’ve been to.  I appreciate the variety they offer and the knowledge of each instructor I’ve practiced with. From kickboxing and barre to traditional yoga classes, I’ve been challenged from each one. The facilities are clean and welcoming! You won’t be disappointed trying out a class!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: This place is great.  I have been doing hot yoga for 15 years.  This has become my favorite place.  One thing I love is the variety of styles and classes.  I send people here all the time because you can easily start as a beginner or be just as easily be challenged if you have been practicing hot yoga for years.

name: Whitney Painter
text: I love this place! I cannot say enough about how knowledgeable the instructors are and willing to help. They are very skilled and masters of their trade. I have recommended this place to my friends, who love it too! Great place:)

name: Tarun Gupta
text: I have been going to HYOH since 2013. This studio is amazing! It provides a perfect ambience for Hot Yoga. The instructors are genuinely there to help you. They have classes for all levels. Great place to make life long friends. With new ownership, sky is the limit! I wholeheartedly recommend this studio. Give it a try, you will be glad you did!

name: Teri Hasemeyer
text: I am loving all the amazing positive changes going on here at HYOH. I have come here since the studio opened in 2010 or so, and the teachers and staff and ownership are just getting higher quality and kinder and even better customer service. I highly recommend hot yoga and highly recommend this studio!

name: Beth Guthrie
text:
I recently had my first experience with Hot Yoga at this studio, and walked in not knowing what to expect. I have a couple of co-workers who were very enthusiastic about practicing hot yoga and said that this was the place to go - I was not disappointed.

The owner of the studio was in conversation with another student when I came in, but made sure to greet me and make me feel welcome. There was a very brief form that I had to fill out with basic information to help the staff make sure you're prepared for your experience, and then after a brief tour I entered for my first hot yoga class.

The class itself was awesome, and was a challenge - but I noticed that because of the room being heated I didn't experience as much tension in my muscles as we worked through the poses. The instructor was very willing to help accommodate those of us who couldn't enter certain poses, and she was also quite helpful in adjusting form or making suggestions on how to modify your pose to get the most out of it.

Between the welcoming staff/instructors, pleasant atmosphere, and variety of yoga classes offered, I will DEFINITELY be back again!

name: Chung-thuy Pham
text:
I loved my experience at this studio!! I think the $20 introductory month is such an incredible value. I took advantage of this and went to as many as 4 classes in one week!

Seek out the classes with Neal or Megan if you can. The classes with these instructors are tough, but Neal and Megan will help you get into the correct form and alignment. They will also help talk you through how to get into and improve on the more difficult poses. They're both very kind and encouraging =)

Unfortunately, I live 30 mins away from the studio and with my college student budget I won't be able to continue classes here. Once my budget allows it, I would love to come back and take classes here again!

name: Ciara Holmes
text: Just moved to the area back in June and have been trying to find a hot yoga studio. Did a lot of scouring in the area and come to find out there aren’t a whole lot of options. Decided to give this studio a try. Took a Yin class with Kris. The class was ok. She talked a lot during the class which I thought was slightly frustrating, her instructions could have been better, and she was on her phone for the most part. The studio was nice, the space however I don’t think is meant for a hot yoga studio persay. The hot aspect is where I felt like the studio fell short. Granted it was just a warm class, the warmth wasn’t consistent, and that may be due to the fact it’s forced heat. I was wanting to sweat and do yoga, I barely broke a sweat. I couldn’t find anywhere on the website or mind and body where they specify what type of heat they have going on.

name: Alex Cross
text: I'm confused. Is this a dog kennel or yoga studio. I came here to do yoga and the first few times were fine. Then last night there were dogs everywhere. I dont want to put my bare feet on dog urine.I shouldn't have to take my shoes off and walk on the same floor that dogs use the bathroom on. Leave the dogs at home.

name: Bailee Barrilleaux
text: I have done regular yoga before and  was curious about this 'Hot Yoga' place. One of my friends convinced a group of us to go and I loved it! I thought I would be uncomfortable in the heat, but I adapted to it and barely noticed by the end! After my class, I felt refreshed and not as tired and/or worn out as I expected, but i still felt like i had a good work out. Also, the teachers were very patient and kind to beginners, such as myself, so do not worry if you have never done yoga before! I  recommend taking a class to everyone!

name: Elizabeth Duling
text: Love this place!  They are encouraging and every time I go I love it more!  Plus sometimes you get to see cute puppies too!

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: The manager was rude and condescending to me when I went to try my first class, so much so that I wanted to leave and drive back the 20 minute drive that I made out there to enjoy a workday evening yoga class. I arrived to the studio ten minutes before class, and the manager proceeded to lecture me for almost ten minutes about "being late" and "interrupting others in their practice," when, if she had let me go into the room, I would not have been late at all. She insisted that I fill out forms that I had just previously filled out online when I signed up for the class online earlier in the day. The forms asked for all of the exact information (emergency contact, address, experience with yoga...) that had been filled out extensively on the online form, but she made it out to be that I was neglecting a step and trying to casually sidle in late. There were only six or so people in the class, and the manager's lecturing brought me into class about 1 minute late. She reminded me as I went in that "this is Huntsville; it's different." My address lists that I am from Chattanooga, and I don't know if she was trying to make some comment about the caliber and status of clientele attending Huntsville studios as opposed to Chattanoooga ones, or not... but I can say that I am much more impressed with every Chattanooga studio I've been to than this one, which just left a bad taste in my mouth with its snobbery :/ The class was completely unremarkable, sadly. I'd had high hopes for it, especially after the huge deal that the manager made about entering late.

name: Ria Ghosh
text: Best yoga studio in town! Clean studio! Lovely & knowledgeable teachers!

name: Kathryn Story
text:
Clean, Innovative, Inspiring, Enlightening...

What a wonderful addition to Huntsville! <3

name: Streeter Michael
text: I have been doing yoga for many years and I have been practicing Ashtanga, bikram, vinaysa flow, and yoga nidra ect. Robyn and here staff provide a very strong practice and challenging atmosphere. Just like anything else you get out of it what you put in. This place is yoga I know this because I come from a studio in Hilton Head South Carolina at the Jiva yoga center where they teach yoga and the philosophy of yoga. Yoga saved my life and it started in Hilton Head and now I can continue it at the hot yoga center. In closing I just want you to know I start yoga at almost 300 lbs and over a three year period I lost 86 lbs. At the age of 44 I am in the best shape of my life and better then when I was in Special operations with the US Army Rangers.

name: Brad G
text: Great studio with heat and humidity. Instructors work with you (I'm a newbie) and keep the class moving along and enjoyable.

name: Whitney Sirten
text: Love them!!!

name: Brian Terry
text: As a vinyl collector, I don’t normally like to share my “honey-holes”, but Urban Atlas has one of the best selections of used vinyl records that I’ve seen anywhere . Prices are very reasonable and everything I’ve bought or looked at was graded accurately. There’s also a large selection of clothing, candles , teas and other cool things. They offer yoga and meditation classes as well .

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Mark Mitchell
text: Stopped in today first time,  great place and vibe, a real gem! Awesome vinyl section, picked up a few for the collection!

name: Callie White
text: Cute store but I’ll never shop here again. I was given a gift card for Christmas, which was purchased mid-December, and didn’t realize it had an expiration date. This wouldn’t have been a problem, except the expiration date was April 1st, a mere four months after it was purchased. The problem isn’t the expiration date itself, it’s the fact that it’s not even six months out + we’re in the middle of a global pandemic. It’s not the easiest to get out and use gift cards at the moment. According to the store owner, the money “can’t be held that long” as it’s “unfair to others who sell in the store,” despite the fact that the gift card was paid for, in cash, and should be treated as if it’s cash. This is bad business practice and has turned me off as a customer.

name: Adalanta Grimes
text: I visit every time I’m in Decatur and always find great birthday/Christmas gifts for my whole family plus tons of things that fit my own style!! Would definitely recommend checking it out next time you’re in Decatur!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! ❤️

name: Rebeca Williams
text: Urban atlas is my favorite place in Decatur! I visit here at least once a week, and I always leave with at least 1 thing! They have the coolest records, crystals, art, plants, and so much more! A must see place if you’re in Decatur!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!!

name: Sara Hurley
text: Great place to find the best unique gifts! The owner is extremely helpful and nice. Highly recommended that you check this place out!!!

name: Caleigh Duncan
text: I LOVE Urban Atlas!! There’s always such a great collection of records, clothing, and jewelry!! The atmosphere is always welcoming and enjoyable too. Definitely suggest stopping by to have a look around even if you don’t have anything specific in mind you’re looking for!

name: Amanda Richards
text:
I love this store so much! They have the best incense. The scents burn cleanly, with none of that funky, smoky "incense" smell (If you've ever burned the cheap stuff, you know what I'm talking about.). Smells Like Teen Spirit is my fave! It reminds me of my grandfather's cigars- warm vanilla and cherry.

The teas are good, too! Try the vanilla caramel rooibos herbal. So good, and it has a natural sweet taste.

The employees are also always super friendly and welcoming. This is far and away my favorite hippie shop. 😍

name: Rachelle Harden
text: Absolutally love this place! I've been coming here for 3 years and the vibe is amazing and they have high quality products that are local and amazing staff who remember you. Recommend this place to anyone looking for a unique gift!

name: Jennifer Housley
text: Got a beatiful green wand, loved it, store is so unique, you can get stuff here you can't get other places for sure. Sure even does meditation classes

name: Greg Wolodkewitsch
text: Unique and wonderfully blended, with a smooth vibe and wonderful people. Don't miss out on a one of a kind store.

name: Jerry Cobbs
text: Love this place! They had a free meditation day and we went to three sessions. Such a cool, laid back vibe.

resp.text: Thanks Jerry! It was great to have you!

name: Miss Nikki Shortkonner
text: The girls are good to me and my son

name: Dede Quarry
text: No longer Urban Atlas...they have moved down the street.  It's a new home goods/decor shop called Miss Muldrews

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Byron Cloer
text: Great place.. Great environment.. Great prices

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Amazing store and great staff!!

name: Sherri House
text: Super unique with great staff

name: Tammara Buckey
text: Great array of clothing, accessories, music and more!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Will
text: Love it 💕

name: Barnacle Bill
text: Among all the other locations this one is the least desirable. The Pelham location offers so much more in a more updated facility. Don’t waste your time here. 👎👎

resp.text: Hi Bill! Glad you are enjoying the Pelham location.  Members get to enjoy multi-club access. While Hoover may not have the glitz and glam of our newer locations, it is special to 24e. Hoover was our very first location and has an "Old School" vibe and equipment you would be hard pressed to find anywhere else. So show us some love and consider giving us 5 stars. Thanks and Happy New Year!!

name: LaDarren Smith
text: BYSWO Fitness Trains out of this funk and it is the absolute best for those looking to take their fitness to another level! byswofitness.com can help with personal training and nutrition coaching

name: Christopher Peters
text: One of the best gyms in Birmingham with multiple locations

resp.text: Thanks Christopher!! So great to hear you are enjoying 24e. It's an honor to serve our awesome members!

name: WADE COLEMAN
text: Awesome gym, awesome environment. Great variety of equipment too.

name: Philip Duchock
text: Decent gym, a little small but conviemient for those who work odd hours. Customer service is good but im not a fan of the contract would recommend for locals near by.

name: Devin M Chapman
text: Clean, neutral environment. Great place to get some work in and be your self.

name: JaCorey Murray
text: I've been with this gym since 2012 and no complaints. Love the free weights, space and ability to come at any time of the day. If you're looking for a personal trainer, I'll recommend Nicolette Hayes. She is very talented and has a wide range of options to help with general cardio and strength conditioning. She'll also take the time to understand and customize your workout.

resp.text: Hi JaCorey! Thanks for taking the time to leave a great review. We are so thankful to have you at 24e for all these years. It is an honor. Thank you!!!

name: Jason Harmon
text:
Knowledgeable management and friendly.
Most adequate facilities for facilitating better health. Highly recommend

name: Carlos Cumpiano
text: This is a great gym. The staff is great. Very friendly people and like to make sure they have relationships with their members. It’s a little more than PF black card but well worth the price. Everyone that goes wants to work and better themselves.

name: Sabrina Gaddy
text: Luv 24e! It's a modern 'old school' style gym. Fantastic equipment & lots of it! Also lot of free weights! Open 24 hrs which is so awesome for those of us who work weird hours. Staff is great! always cheerful &  happy to assist!  Luv this gym!!

resp.text: Thank you, Sabrina!

name: Tommie Wisaeu
text: Honestly, this gym is EASILY the BEST gym I've been to. Nothing else comes close. Well, maybe a gym that costs 3x as much will be as good, but why bother when this gym is clean, has all of the equipment you could possibly need, and staff that genuinely cares. Price is fair, all the equipment works, plenty of changing rooms and bathrooms, private showers, this gym is as good as it gets.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Trent!! So thankful to have you at 24e!!

name: Bergen Bolt
text:
The best gym in town!
I've used several different local gyms over the years, and this one is far and away my favorite. The equipment is fantastic, the facility is large and open, the staff is knowledgeable, helpful, and friendly, and the other members are amazing. As a woman on a weight loss journey, it can be difficult to find a gym where it feels like I belong. And it's really cool to feel like I belong in a gym where bodybuilding athletes train!
The price is perfect and the service and support from staff is above and beyond! I recently had surgery and they called to check on me to make sure I was healing okay. I love this gym!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for those kind words!! It is truly a blessing to have such awesome members!! Thanks Bergen!!

name: Garrett Bell
text: This gym is great for anyone. The environment is very nice, with a good mix of beginners up to series bodybuilders. Mix of older and newer equipment which is very well maintained. Staff is friendly and helpful. I have and would recommend this gym to anyone. Gym gets fairly busy later in the day from 4-6pm but never to busy to get on the machines and weights you want to use. The best part is you can workout any time any day. For the most part there is always a few people working out.

name: Deep South
text: Best gym I have ever been a member of, common sense owner and staff.

name: Steve Trowbridge
text: Great Gym! Never packed, very clean, employees are great!

resp.text: Thanks Steve!! That is great to hear! We are thankful have such awesome members and staff!

name: David Rhodes
text: Team Swole, Whooo!

resp.text: Ha! That's right! Thanks for the five stars!!

name: Steven Johnson
text: I have been going to this gym since it opened. I love it because they have a lot of free weights and many different types. They even have lifting platforms with bumper style plates for Olympic and power lifting. I wouldn't go anywhere else. The owner and staff are top notch as well

name: Koinonia with God
text:
What makes 24e so special is my personal trainer, Hugheston. He is one of the most soft-hearted and intentional people I have ever met. Your goals become his goals and he somehow always manages to go the extra mile with you. I have spent my whole life away from the gym but he has transformed my negative perception of working out into a world of excitement and possibility. I never thought I could enjoy working out!

I'm always suspicious about trainers but he is not in it for the money, his motivation is in getting to transform your lives and I have gotten to see that first hand.

resp.text: Thank you, so much! We are certainly proud of Hugheston and are thankful for awesome members like you!!

name: Jim McFerrin
text: Best equipment and staff in town.

resp.text: Not to mention, the best members!! Thank you!

name: Bryan Gilbert
text: Best customer experience I’ve ever had at a business. Houston at the front desk was one of the friendliest people I’ve ever met. Give that man a raise.

text: Best bang for buck ive ever gotten from a gym. Always open and it's good for people who really want to work out. Even though it's more of a bodybuilder gym, the crowd has always been really welcoming to whoever

name: bwarren1975
text: I like this gym. Owner is cool. Employees are cool. Membership price is not bad.  Hammer strength equipment is good.

name: Craig Summerville
text: Why would you go anywhere else?  Definitely the best "bang for the buck", so to speak.  There are no other gyms in the area where you can spend $25.00 a month and have access to a gym 24 hours a day!  This makes it super convenient if you work odd hours.  The atmosphere is fantastic.  The equipment is modern, clean, and well maintained.  The staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable.  So, I ask again, why would you go elsewhere?

name: Shaun Southward
text: Best gym in Birmingham. Only gym in town that gives you access to a full gym, that's 24/7 with no contract memberships. Staff was great, not stuffy like most places. $25 per month for this place is a steal

text: 8 dollars daily. Great for travelers. Awesome gym, friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks Marc!!

name: Donald Watkins
text: I have some friends that work out here. its not for the faint of heart. if you are serious about getting fit and making it a lifestyle this may be the perfect gym for you.

name: Charlie Prince
text: Best gym I've ever been to. Clean, had whether you need the people and ut has a great culture of your serious about getting in shape.

name: J Spratling
text: I experienced the same poor service when I tried to cancel my membership.  Jack, the manager, was extremely unprofessional.  I would NOT recommend this gym to anyone.  There are several gyms in the Birmingham area.  You can easily find one that appreciates your business from the time you sign up to the time you cancel.  Do not go to this gym.

name: Brent Harris
text: 24e fitness in Hoover is awesome, and the atmosphere is great. Hugheston is my personal trainer and I highly recommend him. We have great interaction, while he gives me valuable coaching techniques. Hugheston has also helped me with a great diet plan to help me achieve my goals. Thanks Hugheston!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brent! It is truly rewarding to have such awesome members and to hear that our trainers, like Hugheston, are making a difference!!

name: Grant Price
text: Great gym, Houghston helped me get in shape with a personal training program!

resp.text: Thanks Grant! We're so happy to hear that Hugheston is helping you meet your fitness goals!

name: frank baker
text: This is a beautiful facility convenient to research park.  It's nice to have a place to work out at lunch break.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Jay R
text: This is a clean, well run, locally owned business. 24e offers just about every service you'd want from a Health Club membership.

name: Nannette Zeanah
text: I have used this gym for 5 years.  My family uses it as well.  I have lost 105 pounds.  Wow!  That's amazing isn't it!.  My son has lost over 100 pounds as well.  I couldn't have done it without the help of the staff and trainers.  I train with Hugheston at present.  He's amazing and very knowledgeable.  He is very conscientious and seems to care about his clients.  He helps me to do the exercises with the correct form. I am older and have some physical issues.  He works with me to help improve my mobility and flexibility.  That really helps me alot.  I am a nurse and work 12 hours shifts three days a week.  Hugheston helps me immensely.  I could keep going on and on but I want everyone to know that the Hoover 24e is a great place to get healthy and fit.  I've never been uncomfortable or felt out of place.  If I have questions Daniel or Hugheston makes sure to help me find the answers.  So if you want to get fit or just be healthy come see what the gym is all about.

name: Chris Ehrixh
text: Great gym. Love it.

resp.text: Thanks Chris!

name: Cameron White
text: Great staff, great regulars, and most importantly great gym.

name: Jeff Randle
text: This fitness club is HUGE with so many options for literally anything you could want to do. The cardio equipment is all the way on the other side of the gym from the free weights so the people who don't want to mingle don't have to. If machines are your thing, they have any and all that you can imagine. They've really tried to cover every base with this gym.

name: Charlie Graham
text: No Cooling Off Period or Try It Out Time. I joined this gym and after going five times did not feel like it was the right fit for me, and did not like going to a gym without staff at night. When I contacted Daniel at the gym and asked if I could cancel I was told my only options were to pay a $150 or finish out the contact without using the gym if I did not like it. He said it did not matter that I had only been a member for less than a two weeks. So beware they do not offer a trial period - join and if you do not like it pay their fee.
